item.title: Skupper service ingress through containers
item.description: Introduction In order to evaluate some strategies for dealing with ingresses using a stable name resolution within a container network (Podman or Docker), I have used the following scenario as the foundation for this study: In the following sections, I will describe each component in more detail. Artifacts for each strategy are also available and they can be easily executed using podman-compose or docker compose. Service Proxies The service proxies are the main objects to be explored here.
